title: [Question]Prodecude for campus change
content:
Whats the procedure for shifting from ec cse to rr cse after sem 2? 
Do they release cutoffs before or after sem 3 starts?

comments.body:
No cutoffs just they call everyone who applied for change to rr campus and hold another bidding session highest GPA first. One guy will sit there on excel maintaining the live count of seats. Im 2027 Batch for us rr cse was 9.6 cutoff around.

For more details just search a lil there are many people for have asked about this.
They'll open a form on the website and will inform you that it is open. Usually happens a week after 3rd sem starts
do you know what the cutoff was for ai ml?
I dont remember exactly but rr aiml was lower than ec cse which was cutoff at 8.8 or 8.6. ec aiml went way lower
